column1: # Creation Process: Entered from scan of handwritten data sheet (in Version Control)
# About corrections: Obvious writing errors were unified (see sheet 01..), missing data marked as „nA“
# Variable „Aufnahme Nr.“: Unique Ids for pottery fragments, the main entities of the table
# Variable „Befund“: IDs for find context, obviously pit house pits, several mentionings possible.

column2: Alphanumeric ID, standardized to „H“ for category of find context „house“ and two digits numbers

column1: # Variable „Grundriss“: nominal scale with 2 categories: „rund“, „eckig“; no definition
# Variable „Gefäßform“: nominal scale with 2 categories: German translations of Japanese terms kame and tsubo as „Topf“ and „Flasche“
# Variable „Maximaler Radius“: numeric (ratioscale) Variable for measurement of the maximum radius of the vessel where possible

column2: Missing values: „nA“ (not available) without decision whether is was not recorded or could not be measured.
